    • resultCheck

      public void resultCheck​(int r, int cC, int cCP)
      this is a function that changes the image of the result section according to amount of correct colour and amount of correct position and colour
      Parameters:
      r - the row of the current position
      cC - the number of correct colour
      cCP - the number of input that colour and position are correct

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      when the button is pressed it will use the changeIcon function and change the icon of current position this method will always check whether the user has won or run out of attempts and if either situation happened flag1 or flag2 will change its value and popup the message for each column completed it will check the answer

      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
